itunes:title: Do Not Fear Week 2 with Travis Garner
title: Do Not Fear Week 2 with Travis Garner
description:
Continuing in our Do Not Fear reading plan, Raechel and Amanda are joined for Week 2 by pastor Travis Garner. Together, they walk through several biblical narratives that highlight the deep reality of fear and the deeper reality of God’s character and presence in the midst of it. Join them as they remind us and each other that God sees and hears us, even in the face of the fear that so many of us feel. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Title reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/do-not-fear-week-2-with-travis-garner
